hanzi-su-wiki:
傑

Значения

Великолепный, превосходный

Мнемоника

Удалец 亻, храбростью не уступающий опасным преступникам 舛, которых для устрашения вешали на деревьях 木.

Варианты

杰

jié
hero; heroic; outstanding person; prominent; distinguished
герой; героический; выдающийся человек; видный; выдающийся

(Simplified: 杰)
Pictophonetic: 桀 indicates the sound; 亻 (person) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:

傑作 [ jié zuò ]: masterpiece
purpleculture_tree:

heisig_chinese_memo: My wise person says greatness does not come from wearing shades (sunglasses) but from planting trees to give everyone outstanding shade.
heisig_constituent: greatness, person, sunglasses, dancing legs, ballerina, evening, tree, wood
koohiiStory1: My wise person says greatness does not come from wearing shades (sunglasses) but from planting trees to shade everyone.
koohiiStory2: Mr T stands in front of you, his greatness radiating out from him so brightly. You need to put on your sunglasses and hide behind a tree to even talk to the guy. "Recognise, foo!".
jp_example_words:
傑(けつ): excellence
傑作(けっさく): masterpiece, best work, blunder
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The leader does a dance on top of the tree to show his greatness to everyone around. If he dances all the way up there on top of the tree, then no one can deny his excellence!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: "Look upon your leader's greatness!" he shouts, doing a jig around on the branches.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: If you don't recognize the leader's greatness he will throw ketsup (けつ) all over you (it's a special mix of ketchup and catsup). And it's ketsup because it looks like blood. The blood he'll spill if you don't look up and clap at his great dancing.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: "Oh leader, your greatness is so... great!" you shout up at him. He's holding the ketsup bottle over your head and staring into your eyes as he dances in the tree. He isn't sure if he wants to dump it on you yet. He isn't sure if you really recognize his excellence.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 燦 (さんたる、サン блистающий).
Ru_Radicals: 化 (превращаться), 夕 (вечер), 木 (дерево), 舛 (танцующие ноги)
Ru_trainchinese: jié: (графема) выдающийся человек; выдающийся, видный
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the man (亻) in the tree (木) opposes (舛) excellence
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: My wise person says greatness does not come from wearing shades (sunglasses) but from planting trees to give everyone outstanding shade.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " person " and " Jie ", the original meaning is peculiar, beyond the general. "Shuowen": "Audience. From the people, the sound." "Poetry. Zhou Song‧ Zaiyun": "The post station has its reach, and there is a hatred of its master." Mao Chuan: "Jie, Yanjie and Miao are disgusted. Beauty is also." Kong Yingda Shu: "Jie, it is said that among them is particularly beautiful."

" Jie " can mean a person with extraordinary talents. Song Luyou's "Notes to Lao Xue'an" Volume 6: "Wang Bozhao grew up in rituals and music. The book of ritual discussions in the past dynasties and dynasties can be recited. It can also be described as a master of the time."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " person " and " Jie ", the original meaning is peculiar, beyond the general.
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，「桀」聲，本義為特異，超出一般。《說文》：「傲也。从人，桀聲。」 《詩‧周頌‧載芟》：「驛驛其達，有厭其傑。」毛傳：「傑，言傑苗厭然特美也。」孔穎達疏：「傑，謂其中特美者。」

　　「傑」可表示才智超群的人。宋陸游《老學庵筆記》卷六：「王伯照長於禮樂，歷代及國朝議禮之書，悉能成誦，亦可謂一時之傑。」
humanum_short_description: 從「人」，「桀」聲，本義為特異，超出一般。

從「 人 」，「 桀 」聲，本義為特異，超出一般。《說文》：「傲也。从人，桀聲。」 《詩‧周頌‧載芟》：「驛驛其達，有厭其傑。」毛傳：「傑，言傑苗厭然特美也。」孔穎達疏：「傑，謂其中特美者。」 「 傑 」可表示才智超群的人。宋陸游《老學庵筆記》卷六：「王伯照長於禮樂，歷代及國朝議禮之書，悉能成誦，亦可謂一時之傑。」
From the sound of " person" and " Jie", the original meaning is peculiar, beyond the general. "Shuowen": "Audience. From the people, the sound." "Poetry. Zhou Song‧ Zaiyun": "The post station has its reach, and there is a hatred of its master." Mao Chuan: "Jie, Yanjie and Miao are disgusted. Beauty is also." Kong Yingda Shu: "Jie, it is said that among them is particularly beautiful." " Jie" can mean a person with extraordinary talents. Song Luyou's "Notes to Lao Xue'an" Volume 6: "Wang Bozhao grew up in rituals and music. The book of ritual discussions in the past dynasties and dynasties can be recited. It can also be described as a master of the time."

傑字的基本解释

傑
jié
同“杰”。

傑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jié］
［《廣韻》渠列切，入薛，羣。］
亦作“杰1”。
(1)才智超群的人。
(2)指特出之物。
(3)谓秀出。
(4)高大；高耸。
(5)用力貌。参见“傑然”。
(6)见“傑傑”。
(7)通“桀”。凶暴。参见“傑黠”、“傑暴”。
(8)通“楬”。作标志用的小木桩。
(9)姓。见明顾起元《客座赘语·僻性》。

傑字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　傑； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页113第09
【唐韻】渠列切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】巨列切，?音桀。【淮南子·泰族訓】知過萬人者謂之英，千人者謂之俊，百人者謂之豪，十人者謂之傑。又【前漢·高祖紀】子房，蕭何，韓信三者，皆人傑也。　又【說文】傲也。　又【詩·周頌】有厭其傑。【傳】傑，苗之先長者。　又叶其利切，音暨。【曹植·學宮頌】於鑠尼父，生民之傑。性與天成，該聖備藝。

傑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

傑字的起名意思

暂无。

Jie
Basic explanation of words
Jie
jié
Same as "Jie".
Jie
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jié］
["Guang Yun" Qu Lie cut, into Xue, group. ]
Also known as "Jie 1".
(1) A person with outstanding talents.
(2) Refers to outstanding things.
(3) Said to show up.
(4) Tall; towering.
(5) Forced appearance. See "Jie Ran".
(6) See "Jiejie".
(7) Through "Jie". Fierce. See "Jie Fu", "Jie Bao".
(8) Through "楬". Small wooden stakes used as signs.
(9) Last name. See Ming Gu Qiyuan's "Gu Qiyuan".
Jie
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　jie; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 113 No. 09
[Tang Yun] Qu Lieqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] [Zheng Yun] Ju Lieqie,? Yin Jie. [Huainanzi·Thai Clan Training] Those who have known over ten thousand people are considered to be the British, those who have thousands of people are considered to be handsome, those of a hundred are considered to be heroes, and those of ten are called outstanding. Also [Previous Han·Gao Zu Ji] Ovary, Xiao He and Han Xin are all outstanding people.　[Said Wen] Ao Ye.　[Poetry·Song of Zhou] There is a hatred of Qijie. [Biography] Jie, the elder before Miao.　 Ye Qiliqi again, sound cum. 【Cao Zhi·Xuegong Song】Father Yu Shuo Ni, a master of Shengmin. Sex and nature, the holy preparation.

Old glyph
Jie
Name meaning
Nothing.
jié
вм. 杰
Radicals: ｲ, 舛, 木  (leader, dance, tree)
Meaning Mnemonic
The leader does a dance on top of the tree to show his greatness to everyone around. If he dances all the way up there on top of the tree, then no one can deny his excellence!
"Look upon your leader's greatness!" he shouts, doing a jig around on the branches.
Reading Mnemonic
If you don't recognize the leader's greatness he will throw ketsup (けつ) all over you (it's a special mix of ketchup and catsup). And it's ketsup because it looks like blood. The blood he'll spill if you don't look up and clap at his great dancing.
"Oh leader, your greatness is so... great!" you shout up at him. He's holding the ketsup bottle over your head and staring into your eyes as he dances in the tree. He isn't sure if he wants to dump it on you yet. He isn't sure if you really recognize his excellence.
